subject: Pedal baseplate
description_text:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I ordered the pedal set without the baseplate, but I wanted to order the pedal with the baseplate.
Could you support me with changing the order?
Order Number: SSN4112

Thank you in advance,
Laszlo Maitz

conversations.body_text: Hi Maitz László,    Okay, you can click the link to pay the difference.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1

Dear Sir or Madam,

Thank you for the support,
I will pay the difference today. (2025.11.29.)

BR,
Laszlo Maitz

> 2025. nov. 29. dátummal, 11:52 időpontban support@simsonn.com írta:
> 
> ﻿

Hi Maitz László,    Okay, we've updated your order for you.
